moves.name: Body Slam
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: On My Mark!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.effect: Never misses during a hailstorm. Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

passives.name: Terrify 1
passives.description: Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs when the Pokémon enters a battle.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Dirty Fighting 1
passives.description: Powers up moves when the move’s target or targets are affected by a status condition.
